channel.title: Captain Claw on Jefklaks Codex

item.title: Captain Claw Review
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Ah, 2D platformers. This genre disappeared after the DOS era on the PC. Also the consoles liked more the 3D platform games like hundreds of Mario 64 clones. There was almost never an attempt to revive the classic 2D side-scrolling action and add a few modern elements to it. Except for Monolith Productions of course! We know Monolith mostly from First Person games like the recent F.E.A.R. and of course the No One Lives Forever series.
